EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: 0.0, 0.0) – Core facility for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5) – Stores the produced iron plates.

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position: -16.0, -51.0) – Extracts iron ore; currently operating in WORKING status with sufficient fuel.
- Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -49.5) – Conveys extracted ore toward the processing stage.
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -49.5) – Now rotated to Direction.UP with an updated drop position at (-14.5, -50.5); final status is WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.
- Iron Chest (sink) (position: -13.5, -47.5) – Designated sink for items from the burner inserter.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Placement and Chest Positioning Errors
  – Ensure target tiles are completely free before placing sink chests.
  – Adjust candidate offsets and use non-zero spacing values when buildable positions are repeatedly rejected.
  – Verify that reference positions and directional setups do not lead to collisions with existing entities or unbuildable terrain.

• Belt Connection and Reversed Connection Errors
  – Confirm that connection paths between transport belts and inserters remain unobstructed and correctly aligned.

• Inventory and Sub-ingredient Availability
  – Verify that all necessary items (e.g., iron chests) are available in the inventory before placement.

• Fuel Management
  – Monitor and maintain sufficient fuel levels in burner entities to prevent transitions into NO_FUEL states and ensure smooth operation.

• Output Sink Blockage
  – Clear any mispositioned items or chests from the sink area adjacent to the output inserter to avoid blockage warnings.

• Entity Rotation and Placement Adjustments
  – When rotating entities (such as changing the burner inserter’s direction), reassess adjacent buildable areas and adjust offsets as needed.
  – Remove interfering entities to allow successful placement of sink chests with the new drop positions.
